MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:11PM. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is a fault on the electrical cable network affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:44PM on 24TH October 2020.
